    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppSettings
    Class representing AppSettings.
    DisplayMenus
    Display menu's class contains all the code needed for the program menu's.
    Expense
    Expense class represents an expense with attributes such as name, amount, category, whether it is recurring, and the timestamp of creation.
    Main
    Main class to run the budgeting application.
    MenuColors
    Utility class providing ANSI escape codes for text and background colors, as well as text styles to be used in console applications.
    Settings
    Abstract class representing a generic Settings object.
    User
    User class represents a user of the application and has attributes such as username, name, lastname, password and income
    UserSettings
    Class representing userSettings.
